name: CatCraft
description:
The space station is being attacked by the red cats and you need to save as many of yellow cats before the space station blows up. Find the escape pod on the station, gathering keys to unlock the hatch and get the hell out. 

Use the mouse to fling the cats around the level.  Clicking on them to let them interact with their surroundings. The can claw, shoot and purrr. Find keys in the maze and bring them back to the terminal to complete the game.

Controls:

P key for Paws.

Left Click - Drag objects/cat and activate cat powers (like shoot from gun)

WASD - pan the camera

Mouse Wheel to zoom in and out. Middle mouse to snap camera back.
